text:
Only a very limited subset of ASCII characters can be used in URL strings.  To 
send Chinese data in the query string you need to convert the data to UTF-8 and 
encode the resulting bytes using the %XX encoding as in url-encoding.  The W3C 
site has additional informatin about I18n issues and HTTP and HTML.
